name: Abjuration
description: Wield arcane shielding to banish harm and protect the weak.

2.name: Abjuration Savant
2.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy an abjuration spell into your spellbook is halved.

2.name: Arcane Ward
2.description: When you cast an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher, you can create a magical ward that absorbs damage equal to twice your wizard level + your Intelligence modifier.

6.name: Projected Ward
6.description: When a creature within 30 feet of you takes damage, you can use your reaction to have your Arcane Ward absorb that damage instead.

10.name: Improved Abjuration
10.description: Add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make as part of casting abjuration spells such as dispel magic and counterspell.

14.name: Spell Resistance
14.description: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and resistance to spell damage.
